inclusion.criterion: Age ≥ 18 years old at the time of starting biological modifier therapies or at the time of recruitment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Positive for anti-HBc OR Positive for anti-HBs and born before year 1988
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Known HBV carrier with HBsAg positive
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Concomitant HCV and/ or HIV infection
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection, but no evidence of HBV carrier status or concomitant infections. He is on treatment with IFN and RBV combination therapy.
